entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Trump must keep off the development of a potential vaccine. He must be made not to involve his petty politics in the COVID-19 vaccine. He must let scientists do their research without undue interference.
